metadata.Title: CVE-2023-46219 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low
metadata.Description:
HSTS long file name clears contents

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-46219` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

curl - 7.88.1-8ubuntu2.4
libcurl3-gnutls - 7.88.1-8ubuntu2.4
libcurl3-nss - 7.88.1-8ubuntu2.4
libcurl4 - 7.88.1-8ubuntu2.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: curl package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.88.1-8ubuntu2.4').
